description.@en: You are granted the gift of being able to speak the tongue of any creature of the wild, conversing as you would with a stranger. Be warned though, not every creature is willing to hold a normal conversation with you â€“ their savage heart trumps reasoned communication!

criticalFailure.@en: With but a whisper, your voice is stricken from you and replaced by one taken from a Beast of the natural world (the GM will decide which Beast). For 24 hours you can nothing except grunt, growl or roar.

criticalSuccess.@en: As above, but add a +20 Base Chance instead.

effect.@en: After successfully casting this spell, you gain the ability to speak with any creature classified as a Beast. In addition, you gain a +10 Base Chance to all Skill Tests to converse with and befriend them.

reagents.@en: A crabapple, smashed beneath your boot (expended)
